com.centurylink.mdw.ant.taskdef

Class XsdDownload

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • com.centurylink.mdw.ant.taskdef.HttpDownload
          • com.centurylink.mdw.ant.taskdef.XsdDownload
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class XsdDownload
extends HttpDownload
    Connects via HTTP to a URL and downloads the specified xsd. Examples: 
      <xsddownload url="http://www.qwest.com/myschema.xsd" dir="./">
    Downloads myschema.xsd from qwest.com and places it into the current directory.
